action_inputs.description: If set to True, only the default portal will be changed. Otherwise the colors for all portals on this CB will be changed.
action_inputs.label: Only Change Default Portal
action_inputs.name: only_change_default_portal

description: Not extremely practical, except for learning a bit about interacting with Django's Object Relational Model (ORM), which underlies CloudBolt, and for punking your friends' CloudBolt's on April 1st.
name: Randomly Change CloudBolt Colors
script_filename: Sub File for Hook of Randomly Change CloudBolt Colors Script.py
